long_description: This GoPro protective lens fits over your GoPro HERO3 or HERO3+ camera lens to help guard against dirt, dust and scratches while using the camera without its housing. Perfect for use with The Frame mount (sold separately) or for handheld shooting with just the camera. Includes 2 protective lenses.
short_description: This GoPro protective lens fits over your GoPro HERO3 or HERO3+ camera lens to help guard against dirt, dust and scratches while using the camera without its housing.
